[\[40b.7\]]bden gsum dang rang sangs rgyas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no/_/de'i phyir bden pa bzhi char yang mngon par rtogs na chos la shes nas dad pa 'thob [#]po/_/de dag ni dad pa'i gzhi'i [#]bye brag las ming gi sgo nas shes nas [#]dad pa bzhi zhes bya ba'o/_/rdzas su gnyis
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]te dad pa dang /_tshul khrims/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa rnams ni dad pa'i rang bzhin dag yin no/_/'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rnams ni tshul khrims yin pas rdzas gnyis so/_/ci 'di dag zag pa dang bcas pa dag
[\[41a.2\]]cig [#]gam zag pa med pa dag cig yin zhe na/_shes nas dad pa rnams ni gcig tu/_dri ma med pa yin/_shes nas dad pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na/_bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs nas yid ches pa ni shes nas dad pa [#]yin no/_/'di dag gi rim pa ni langs nas
[\[41a.3\]]ji ltar mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du bkod do/_/langs nas ji ltar mngon sum [#]byed ce na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/_/de'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin no/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs
[\[41a.4\]]par zhugs pa yin no zhes bya bar mngon sum du byed de/_sman pa dang sman dang nad g.yog lta bur gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/sems rab tu dang bas byas pa'i [#]tshul khrims kyang rab tu dang ba yin pas tha mar bzhi pa bshad de/_'di ni de ltar rab tu dang bar gyur pa'i sgrub [#]pa yin
[\[41a.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na nad med pa lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na ston par byed pa dang /_lam dang /_lam grogs dang /_bzhon pa lta bu yin no/_/mdo las slob pa ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan no/_/mi slob pa ni yan lag bcu dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa/_ci'i phyir
[\[41a.6\]]slob pa la yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i shes pa ma [#]bshad ce na/_bcings phyir slob pa'i yan lag tu/_/rnam grol ma bshad/_slob pa ni da dung nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams kyis [#]bcings pa yin pas bcings bzhin du ji ltar rnam par grol bar rnam par gzhag [#]
[\[41a.7\]]ste 'ching ba'i phyogs gcig las grol bas ni grol [#]zhes mi bya'o/_/rnam par grol ba med par [#]yang ji ltar rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnam [#]par gzhag_/mi slob pa ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad las gtan du nges par thar pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang /_de so so rang gi [#]shes
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]pa dag gis rab tu phye ba yin pas de kho na la de smos pa rig pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/rnam par grol [#]zhes bya ba 'di ci zhe na/_de rnam gnyis/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas so/_/de la/_nyon mongs bcom pa 'dus ma byas/_/mos pa 'dus byas nyon mongs pa spangs pa ni rnam par
[\[41b.2\]]grol ba 'dus ma byas yin no/_/mi slob pa'i mos pa ni rnam par grol ba 'dus byas yin no/_/yan lag ni de yin/_rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de ni mi slob pa'i yan lag tu bshad de[#]/_yan lag rnams ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid rnam grol gnyis/_rnam par grol ba 'dus byas de
[\[41b.3\]]nyid mdo las/_sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba gnyis su gsungs te/_de nyid rnam par grol ba'i phung po yin par yang blta'o/_/gzhan dag na re mdo las/_stag gi byang chub kyi bu dag rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa gtso
[\[41b.4\]]bo gang yin zhe na/_'di na [#]dge slong 'dod chags las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin/_zhe sdang dang gti mug las sems 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par grol ba yin te/_'di ltar rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par
[\[41b.5\]]byed pa'am/_yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus gang yin pa zhes rgyas par gang gsungs pa ji lta bu/_de'i phyir rnam par grol ba ni mos pa kho na yin par ma zad do/_/[#]'o na ci zhe na/_de kho na shes pas 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs nas
[\[41b.6\]]sems dri ma med pa nyid rnam par grol ba yin no zhes zer ro[#]/_/yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba bshad zin to/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba las ma gtogs pa yang dag pa'i shes pa gang zhig yin zhe na/_byang chub ji skad bshad shes pa/_sngar byang chub ji skad du bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid
[\[41b.7\]]'dir yang dag pa'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/sems gang zhig rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_ci 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byung ba yin [#]zhe na/_mi slob sems ni skye 'gyur ba/_/sgrib pa las ni rnam grol 'gyur[#]/_/
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]bstan bcos las mi slob pa'i sems ma 'ongs pa sgrib pa rnam [#]las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /_/de'i sgrib pa yang gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin te/_de skye ba la bgegs [#]byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe de
[\[42a.2\]]yang spong bar 'gyur la mi slob pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de spangs nas ni mi slob pa'i sems de yang skyes pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no/_/'o na skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang /_'jig rten pa gang yin pa ji lta bu zhe na/_de dag kyang rnam
[\[42a.3\]]par grol bar 'gyur mod kyi skye bar nges pa gang yin pa de kho na bshad do/_/gang las 'jig rten pa rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhe na/_skye ba'i sgrib pa de nyid las so/_/ma grol ba [#]la yang 'jig rten pa'i [#]skye bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na/_de ni de dang mi 'dra'o/_/de ci 'dra zhe
[\[42a.4\]]na/_nyon mongs pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no/_/gnas skabs gang yin pa'i [#]lam gyis de skye ba'i sgrib pa spong zhe na/_'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis ni/_/de yi sgrib pa rab tu spong /_/de ltar gyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas su bshad
[\[42a.5\]]pa gang yin pa dang /_khams gsum po [#]spangs pa'i khams dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams dang /_'gog pa'i khams zhes 'byung ba gang yin [#]de dag la khyad par ci yod ce na/_'dus ma byas nyid khams zhes bya/_/rnam par grol ba 'dus ma byas [#]de nyid khams
[\[42a.6\]]gsum yin no/_/de la/_'dod chags kun zad 'dod chags bral[#]/_/'dod chags spangs pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i khams yin no/_/spangs pa'i khams ni gzhan dag go/_/yang dag par zad pa zhes bya bar sbyar te/_'dod chags las gzhan pa'i nyon mongs
[\[42a.7\]]pa rnams spangs pa ni spangs pa'i khams yin no/_/'gog pa'i khams zhes bya ba gzhi/_/yang dag par zad pa zhes bya ba kho nar sbyar te/_nyon mongs pa las [#]ma gtogs pa bzhi spangs pa ni [#]'gog pa'i khams yin no/_/dngos po gang gis yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]des 'dod chags dang bral bar yang 'gyur ram zhe na/_mu bzhi'o/_/ji ltar byas pas she na/_sdug bsngal rgyu bzod shes rnams kyis/_/yid 'byung sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kho nas yid 'byung bar 'gyur gyi [#]gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/_/
[\[42b.2\]]gang gis spong 'gyur ba/_kun gyis 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal dang [#]kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa gang dag gis nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyis kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta na [#]ni mu bzhi
[\[42b.3\]]srid/_de lta na mu bzhir grub [#]ste/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag [#]mi spong na yid 'byung ba kho na yin te/_yid 'byung ba'i dngos po kho na la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/'gog pa dang lam la bzod pa dang shes pa rnams kyis
[\[42b.4\]]nyon mongs pa dag spong na 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yin te/_mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/snga ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag spong [#]na gnyi ga yin no/_/phyi ma rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong na gnyi ga ma yin no/_/de la 'dod chags dang
[\[42b.5\]]bral ba zhig bden pa rnams la lta na chos shes pa dang bzod pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dag mi spong ngo /_/shes pa rnams kyis ni sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba dang khyad par can gyi lam gyis [#]bsdus pa rnams kyis mi spong ngo /_/[#]chos mngon pa mdzod kyi [#]bshad pa las lam dang gang zag
[\[42b.6\]]bstan pa zhes bya ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa'o//_//bzod pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung [#]/_shes pa rnams zhes kyang 'byung /_yang dag pa'i lta ba [#]zhes kyang 'byung /_yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes kyang 'byung na ci bzod pa dag yin la shes pa ma yin nam/_yang dag pa'i shes
[\[42b.7\]]pa yin la yang dag pa'i lta ba ma yin nam zhe na/_dri med bzod rnams shes pa yin/_/des [#]spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas the tshom ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag yang dag par rtog [#]pa'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir lta ba dag yin no/_/ji ltar bzod pa rnams lta ba yin gyi [#]shes pa ma yin
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]pa de bzhin du/_zad dang mi skye'i [#]blo lta min/_/zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog [#]pa med pa dang /_yongs su 'tshol [#]ba'i bsam pa can ma yin pa'i phyir lta ba ma yin no/_/de las gzhan 'phags blo gnyi ga_/bzod pa dang zad pa dang mi
[\[43a.2\]]skye ba shes pa dag las gzhan pa zag pa med pa'i shes rab ni lta ba dang [#]shes pa yang [#]yin no/_/gzhan shes [#]'jig rten pa'i shes rab thams cad ni shes pa kho na [#]yin no/_/drug ni lta ba'ang yin/_/lta ba lnga dang /_'jig rten pa'i lta ba yang dag pa'i lta ba ste/_'jig rten pa'i
[\[43a.3\]]shes pa rnam pa [#]drug ni lta ba yin gyi [#]gzhan ni lta ba ma yin no/_/'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang shes pa ni ma yin no/_/ji snyed cig gis shes pa thams cad bsdus she na/_shes pa bcus bsdus so/_/mdor bsdu na ni gnyis te[#]/_shes pa zag bcas zag pa med/_/de gnyis las
[\[43a.4\]]kyang /_dang po kun rdzob ces bya'o/_/zag pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni phal cher bum pa dang snam bu dang skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa kun rdzob 'dzin pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes pa yin no/_/zag med rnam gnyis chos dang ni/_rjes su shes pa kho na yin/_/zag pa med pa'i
[\[43a.5\]]shes pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa'o/_/de ltar na shes pa 'di gnyis ni gsum yin te/_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa'o/_/de la/_kun rdzob yul ni thams cad do/_/kun rdzob shes pa'i
[\[43a.6\]]dmigs pa ni ci rigs par 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad yin no/_/chos shes bya ba'i spyod yul ni/_/'dod pa'i [#]sdug bsngal la sogs pa[#]/_/chos shes pa'i dmigs pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_de kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa
[\[43a.7\]]dang lam rnams yin no/_/rjes su [#]shes pa'i spyod yul ni/_/[#]gong ma'i sdug bsngal la sogs yin[#]/_/rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_de kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang lam rnams so/_/de dag nyid bden [#]
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bye brag gis/_/bzhi ste/_chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa de dag nyid bden pa'i bye brag gis [#]sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang [#]/_lam shes pa rnams dang shes pa bzhi yin te/_de dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam bzhi de dag ni/_mi skye ba
[\[43b.2\]]dang zad pa shes/_/chos dang rjes su shes pa lta ba'i rang bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa bzhi po de dag kho nar zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de gnyis dang po skyes pa ni/_/sdug bsngal rgyu rjes shes pa yin/_/zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dang po skyes pa ni sdug bsngal
[\[43b.3\]]dang /_kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin te[#]/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i [#]phung po la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/yang ci rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de gnyis dang dmigs pa gcig pa zhig yin nam zhe na/_gal te sdug bsngal
[\[43b.4\]]dang kun 'byung la dmigs na ni yin no/_/'on te 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa zhig yin [#]na ni dmigs pa gcig pa ma yin no/_/bzhi las pha rol sems rig pa/_/rig par byed pas na rig pa ste shes pa'o/_/pha rol gyi [#]sems shes pa ni shes pa bzhi las skye bar
[\[43b.5\]]blta [#]bar bya ste/_chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang lam shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa rnams las so/_/de'i nges pa ni 'di yin te/_/des ni sa dbang gang zag 'das/_/zhig dang ma skyes mi rig go/_/sa 'das pa mi shes pa ni bsam gtan 'og ma'i sa pas
[\[43b.6\]]bsam gtan gong ma'i sa pa mi shes pa'o/_/dbang po 'das pa mi shes pa [#]ni dad pas mos pa dang dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyis mthong bas thob pa dang dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba'i lam mi shes pa'o/_/gang zag 'das pa mi shes pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra
[\[43b.7\]]bcom pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi lam rnams 'og mas gong ma mi shes pa'o/_/zhig pa dang ma skyes pa mi [#]shes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa mi shes pa ste/_da ltar gyi pha rol gyi sems yul yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang chos rjes blo phyogs phan tshun [#]min/_/
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pha rol gyi sems shes pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems [#]mi shes la/_rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pas kyang chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i sems mi shes te/_de gnyis ni 'dod
[\[44a.2\]]pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/mthong ba'i lam la pha rol gyi sems shes pa med do/_/de'i dmigs pa ni yod de/_de la pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam shes par 'dod pas sbyor ba [#]byas na/_nyan thos mthong ba'i skad cig
[\[44a.3\]]gnyis[#]/_/rig ste bse ru lta bus gsum/_/sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par kun/_/nyan thos kyis ni pha rol gyi [#]sems shes pas mthong ba'i lam las skad cig ma gnyis shes te/_sdug bsngal la [#]chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /_chos shes pa'o/_/rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang
[\[44a.4\]]mthun pa la dmigs pa ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsgrub [#]par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ji srid kyis [#]sbyor ba rtsom pa de srid kyis des [#]sems bcu drug rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bas bar du ni mi shes so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis ni dang po gnyis dang brgyad pa kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa dang /_gsum
[\[44a.5\]]shes te/_sbyor ba chung ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan dag na re dang po dang gnyis pa dang bco lnga pa rnams shes so zhes zer ro/_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]ni sbyor ba med par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma thams cad mkhyen to/_/yang zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag la khyad par ci yod ce na/_
[\[44a.6\]]zad pa shes pa bden rnams la/_/yongs [#]shes la sogs nges pa'o/_/yongs shes byar med ces la sogs/_/mi skye ba yi blor 'dod do/_/bstan bcos las/_zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_bdag gis [#]sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes bya bar shes pa dang /_kun 'byung spangs
[\[44a.7\]]so/_/'gog pa mngon du byas so/_/lam bsgoms so zhes bya bar shes pa'i [#]rgyu las byung ba'i shes pa dang mthong ba dang rig [#]pa dang blo dang rtogs pa dang shes rab dang snang ba dang mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni zad pa shes pa [#]zhes bya'o/_/mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_bdag gis
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]sdug bsngal yongs su shes te/_yang yongs su shes par byar med do zhes bya bar shes pa nas bdag gis lam bsgoms te yang bsgom du med do zhes bya ba'i bar du shes pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i zhes bya ba [#]rgyas par 'byung ngo /_/ji ltar na zag pa med pa'i shes pas de ltar shes she na/_kha che ba
[\[44b.2\]]rnams na re bstan bcos las/_de'i rjes la langs pas de ltar shes te/_de'i phyir de'i bye brag gis de gnyis kyi bye brag bstan to zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re zag pa med pas kyang [#]de ltar shes te/_mthong ba smos pa ni bshad pa 'phangs pa'i phyir ram/_yang na mngon [#]sum du 'jug
[\[44b.3\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/[#]de nyid kyi phyir re zhig shes pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba yang yin no zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer ro/_/de ltar na de dag ni shes pa bcu yin te/_'di lta ste chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes
[\[44b.4\]]pa dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba [#]shes pa'o/_/de la kun rdzob shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la gcig gi cha yang yin no/_/chos shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bdun gyi cha yang yin te/_
[\[44b.5\]]rjes su shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/sdug bsngal shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i [#]cha yang yin te/_kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa shes pa [#]de dang 'dra'o/_/lam shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la lnga'i cha yang yin no/_/pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni shes pa gcig yin la bzhi'i cha
[\[44b.6\]]yang yin no/_/zad pa [#]ni shes pa gcig yin la/_drug gi cha yang yin te/_mi skye ba shes pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/ci'i phyir de dag gsum yod la bcur rnam par gzhag ce na/_rang bzhin dang ni gnyen po dang /_/rnam pa [#]rnam pa spyod yul dang /_/sbyor dang bya ba byas nyid dang /_/
[\[44b.7\]]rgyu rgyas pa las bcu yin no/_/rgyu bdun gyis shes pa bcur rnam par gzhag go zhes grag ste[#]/_rang bzhin las ni kun rdzob shes pa ste/_don dam pa mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyen po las ni chos dang rjes su shes pa dag ste/_'dod pa'i khams dang khams gong ma'i
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dag ste/_dmigs pa tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa dang dmigs pa las ni 'gog pa dang /_lam shes pa dag ste/_rnam pa dang dmigs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyor ba
[\[45a.2\]]las ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa ste/_des ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi shes pa ma yin mod kyi sems shes par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byas pa las grub pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bshad do/_/bya ba byas pa las ni zad pa shes pa ste/_bya ba byas pa'i rgyud la dang [#]po
[\[45a.3\]]nyid du skye ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyu rgyas pa las ni mi skye ba shes pa ste/_zag pa med pa'i shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/thams cad kyi gnyen po thams cad yin pa'i phyir[#]/_chos shes pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnyen po zhes bshad par zad kyi gzhan yang /_bsgom pa'i lam
[\[45a.4\]]la 'gog pa'am/_lam la chos shes gang yin pa/_/khams gsum gyi [#]ni gnyen po yin/_/'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa bsgom pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa dag ni khams gsum char gyi [#]gnyen po yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi rjes ma yin/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi [#]gnyen po
[\[45a.5\]]rjes su shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du med do/_/shes pa bcu po [#]de dag las/_/chos shes pa dang rjes su shes/_/rnam pa bcu drug_/de dag ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o/_/kun rdzob ni/_de bzhin gzhan du'ang /_kun rdzob shes pa ni rnam pa bcu drug can yang yin la gzhan gyi rnam pa can
[\[45a.6\]]yang [#]yin te/_chos thams cad kyi [#]rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/rang rang gi [#]bden pa'i rnam pas bzhi yin [#]no/_/sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang lam shes pa rnams ni rang rang gi [#]bden pa'i rnam pa dag tu 'jug pas re re zhing rnam pa bzhi
[\[45a.7\]]bzhi yin no/_/pha rol yid shes dri med kyang /_de bzhin pha rol gyi [#]sems shes pa zag pa med pa yang de bzhin kho nar rang gi [#]bden pa'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir [#]rnam pa bzhi can yin te/_lam shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dri ma dang bcas ni/_shes bya'i rang gi mtshan nyid rnams/_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]pha rol gyi sems shes pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni shes bya [#]sems dang sems las byung ba rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de'i rnam pa 'dzin te/_rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin par [#]byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyi ga yang /_rdzas re re zhig spyod yul lo/_/gang gi tshe sems
[\[45b.2\]]'dzin pa de'i tshe sems las byung [#]ba rnams mi 'dzin la/_gang gi tshe tshor ba 'dzin pa de'i tshe [#]'du shes mi 'dzin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o/_/'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang
[\[45b.3\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gang [#]gsungs pa ji lta bu zhe na/_de gnyis cig car du 'dzin pa ni ma yin te/_gos dang dri ma cig car du mi 'dzin pa bzhin no/_/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid [#]
[\[45b.4\]]rnam pa gnyis te/_'dres pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas [#]pa nyid dang /_ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid do/_/de la 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni gnyis kyis [#]'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no/_/de las gzhan pa zag pa dang bcas pa ni ldan pa'i 'dod
[\[45b.5\]]chags dang bcas pas na 'dod chags dang bcas [#]pa yin no/_/kha cig na re mdo 'dir ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la/_'dod chags kyi [#]gnyen por ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bshad pa yin te/_gal te 'dod chags dang
[\[45b.6\]]mtshungs par mi ldan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ni nyon mongs pa gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/gzhan dag na re de lta na ni 'o na de'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma yin la/_
[\[45b.7\]]'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par 'gyur bas[#]/_de lta bas na [#]mdo 'dir 'dod chags dang ldan pas kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par bya ste/_gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang bral ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra bar shes
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]par bya'o zhes zer ro/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams [#]na re kun du bsdus pa ni dmigs pa la mngon par sdud pa'i phyir dge ba yin no/_/rnam par g.yeng ba ni rnam par g.yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no zhes zer ro/_/nub phyogs pa rnams na re kun tu
[\[46a.2\]]bsdus pa ni gnyid [#]dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no/_/rnam par g.yeng ba ni nyon mongs pa can gzhan yin no zhes zer ro/_/de skad du [#]mi brjod de/_nyon mongs pa can gyi gnyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir sems de nyid bsdus pa yang yin la rnam par g.yengs pa [#]yang yin par
[\[46a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/bstan bcos las/_sems kun du bsdus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de shes pa'i shes pa ni bzhi ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_lam shes pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/sems
[\[46a.4\]]zhum pa ni le lo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa [#]yin no/_/rab tu bzung ba ni brtson 'grus dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dge ba yin no/_/chung ngu ni rnam par byang ba chung ngu dag gis bsten pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no/_/chen por gyur pa ni de las bzlog pa
[\[46a.5\]]yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no/_/rtsa ba dang /_rin dang /_'khor dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_stobs che chung gi yang phyir te/_nyon mongs pa can ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis kyis rtsa ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/dge ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum gyis so/_/nyon mongs pa can ni 'bad pas
[\[46a.6\]]bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir rin chung ba yin no/_/dge ba ni [#]tshogs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir rin che ba yin no/_/nyon mongs pa can ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa 'thob pa'i phyir 'khor mang ba ma yin la phung po gsum gyis [#]rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/
[\[46a.7\]]dge [#]ba ni 'khor mang ba yin la phung po bzhis rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/yang nyon mongs pa can ni stobs chung ba yin no/_/dge ba ni stobs che ba yin no/_/sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa gcig gis [#]kyang phra rgyas bcu gtan du 'joms par byed pas
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]de'i phyir yang nyon mongs pa ni chung ba yin la dge ba ni chen por gyur pa yin no/_/rgod pa ni rgod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no/_/rgod pa ma yin pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir [#]dge ba yin no/_/rnam par ma zhi ba dang /_rnam par zhi ba yang de dang
[\[46b.2\]]'dra'o/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa ni rnam par g.yeng ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can no/_/mnyam par bzhag pa ni de'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir dge ba yin no/_/ma bsgoms pa ni 'thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa dag gis ma bsgoms [#]pa'i[`] phyir nyon mongs pa can [#]
[\[46b.3\]]no/_/bsgoms pa ni de gnyis kyis bsgoms [#]pa'i phyir dge ba yin no/_/rnam par ma grol ba ni rang bzhin dang rgyud rnam par ma [#]grol ba dag gis rnam par [#]grol ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa can yin no/_/rnam par grol ba ni de gnyis kyis [#]rnam par grol ba'i phyir dge ba yin no
[\[46b.4\]]zhes zer ro/_/de lta na ni mdo dang mi [#]mthun par byas pa yang yin la/_tshig de rnams kyi don gyi [#]khyad par yang ma bshad pa yin no/_/ji ltar na mdo dang mi mthun par byas pa yin zhe na/_mdo las ji ltar na sems nang du kun du bsdus pa yin zhe na/_sems gang rmugs pa dang [#]
[\[46b.5\]]gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur cing nang du kun du 'gog pa dang lhan cig par gyur la lhag mthong dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa yin no/_/ji ltar na phyi rol du rnam par g.yengs pa [#]yin zhe na/_sems gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la rjes su g.yengs pa [#]yin zhing rnam par
[\[46b.6\]]'phros pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/sems de nyid kun du bsdus pa [#]yin la rnam par g.yengs pa yang yin par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa yin nam zhe na/_de skad du ni bshad mod kyi rigs par bshad pa ni ma yin te/_nyon mongs pa can gyi [#]gnyid dang lhan cig par gyur
[\[46b.7\]]pa rnam par g.yengs pa nyid du dam ma bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad pa ma yin nam/_bstan bcos [#]dang 'gal ba ni bla'i mdo dang 'gal ba ni ma yin no/_/ji ltar na tshig de rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ma bshad pa yin zhe na/_sems rnam
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]par g.yengs pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_rgod pa dang rnam par ma zhi ba dang /_mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /_ma bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par ma grol ba rnams kyi [#]mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad [#]pa'i phyir la/_kun du bsdus pa dang /_rab tu bzung ba la sogs
[\[47a.2\]]pa'i mtshan nyid kyang tha mi dad par bshad pa'i phyir ro/_/tshig rnams kyi don gyi khyad par ni ma bshad pa ma yin pa nyid de/_nyon mongs pa can du mtshungs kyang 'di ltar sems nyon mongs pa can 'di ni rnam par g.yengs pa yin no/_/'di ni zhum pa yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par de'i nyes pa'i
[\[47a.3\]]khyad par yang dag par [#]bstan pa'i phyir la/_de bzhin du dge ba [#]yang yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir don gyi khyad par bshad pa kho na yin no/_/mdo dang 'gal ba ma spangs pa'i phyir de ni tshig de rnams kyi don ma yin no/_/gal te mdo las sems de nyid zhum pa yang
[\[47a.4\]]yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin no zhes bya bar bshad na ni gang gi tshe sems zhum pa dang zhum par dogs pa de'i tshe shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom [#]pa'i dus ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe sems rgod pa dang rgod par dogs
[\[47a.5\]]pa de'i tshe chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom [#]pa'i dus ma yin no zhes pa 'di dag gsungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ci 'di la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so sor bsgom mam zhe na/_'di dag yid la byed pa
[\[47a.6\]]bsgom pa yin [#]par 'dod kyi mngon sum du gyur pa [#]ni ma yin pas nyes pa med pa nyid do/_/'di las le lo lhag pa'i sems ni zhum pa zhes bshad la/_rgod pa lhag pa ni rgod pa zhes bshad pas 'gal ba med de/_de gnyis kyang lhan cig pa yin pa'i phyir sems de nyid zhum pa yang
[\[47a.7\]]yin la de nyid rgod pa yang yin [#]zhes smra'o/_/bsam pa can gyi tshig la ni bzlog pa med kyi mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'di ma yin no zhes smra'o/_/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems thams cad 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin no zhes gang [#]bshad pa/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gang zhig yin/_gal te 'dod chags kyi thob pa dang lhan cig pa yin no zhe na ni slob pa'i sems zag pa med pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin no zhe na ni dgra bcom pa'i sems zag pa dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bcas pa
[\[47b.2\]]zhes bya bar gzung bar [#]'gyur te/_'dod chags kyi dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na ji ltar de zag pa dang bcas pa yin/_gal te nyon mongs pa spyi pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni[#]/_de lta na yang gti mug dang bcas par gzung bar 'gyur te/_gti mug gi dmigs
[\[47b.3\]]pa yin [#]pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni thob pa la dmigs pa yang ma yin la/_sems de la dmigs pa'i 'dod chags la dmigs pa can yang ma yin no/_/de lta bas na 'dir [#]'dod chags dang ldan pas 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su 'dod par mi
[\[47b.4\]]bya'o/_'o na ji lta bu zhe na/_mdo'i dgongs pa ni 'dod chags dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yin la/_'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i sems ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no zhes bya bar snang ngo /_/gang las 'di'i sems 'dod chags dang
[\[47b.5\]]bral ba yin/_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bral ba yin/_'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid par phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can yin zhes gsungs pa der ni de'i thob pa dang bral ba las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no/_/nyon
[\[47b.6\]]mongs pa gzhan dang [#]mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa ma yin nam dgongs pa 'di ni [#]nyes pa med de/_de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar mi gzung [#]ngo /_/'o na ci
[\[47b.7\]]lta [#]zhe na/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bcas pa zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par gzung ngo /_/zhar la 'ongs pas chog go/_/grub pa'i mtha' brjod par bya ste/_ci pha rol gyi sems shes pa pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa 'am dmigs pa 'dzin zhe na/_mi 'dzin to/_/de
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ni [#]rnam pa dang dmigs pa la mi ltos pa yin te/_sems 'di chags pa yin no zhes bya bar shes kyi gzugs che ge mo zhig la chags so zhes bya bar ni mi shes so/_/de lta ma yin na/_de gzugs la dmigs par yang 'gyur la/_de la dmigs pa'i
[\[48a.2\]]pha rol gyi sems 'dzin pa ni [#]rang gi ngo bo nyid 'dzin par [#]yang 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi sems shes pa thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba dang /_rdzas kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_pha rol gyi rgyud dang 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[48a.3\]]ldan pa ma yin pa'i yul can mthong ba'i lam [#]bkag pa dang /_bsgom pa'i lam la dmigs pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang mi ldan pa dang /_zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pas ma bsdus pa dang /_bar chad med pa'i lam bkag pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/pha rol gyi
[\[48a.4\]]sems shes pa bshad zin to/_/lhag ma rnam pa bcu bzhi can/_/stong dang bdag med ma gtogs so/_/lhag ma ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag ste/_de gnyis ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs pa rnam pa bcu bzhi can yin no/_/don dam pa pa dag yin yang
[\[48a.5\]]de dag gi stobs kyi rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/'di las srid pa gzhan rab tu mi shes so zhes kun rdzob la ston pa'i phyir ro/_/ci zag pa med pa la rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa yod dam/_'on te med ce na/_re zhig kha che ba rnams kyi ltar na[#]/_dri med
[\[48a.6\]]bcu drug gzhan rnams med/_/rnam pa bcu drug las [#]ma gtogs pa zag pa med pa'i rnam pa med do/_/gzhan yod ces bya [#]bstan bcos las/_/gzhan nyi 'og pa rnams na re yod do zhes zer ro/_/ji ltar na [#]khong du chud ce na/_bstan bcos las zhes bya ba smos te/_bstan bcos
[\[48a.7\]]las 'di skad du mi ldan pa'i sems kyis [#]'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na/_shes par 'gyur te/_rigs pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba [#]dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_rgyu dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_rab
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]tu skye ba dang /_rkyen dang /_'di ni gnas yod do/_/'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo /_/gal te gang las 'di ni gnas yod do/_/'di ni gzhi yod do zhes de snyam du shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni 'di ma yin te/_'on kyang mi rtag pa la
[\[48b.2\]]sogs pa [#]shes par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas yod do/_/'di ni gzhi yod do zhes bya ba yin no/_/zhe na/_ma yin te/_gzhan nas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/gal te 'di bstan bcos kyi don yin par 'gyur na/_'di skad du mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems kyis [#]'dod pa
[\[48b.3\]]dang ldan pa'i chos rnams shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na/_shes par 'gyur te/_rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i sgo nas bdag dang /_bdag gi dang /_rtag pa dang /_chad pa dang /_rgyu med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_skur ba 'debs pa dang /_mchog dang /_gtso bo dang /_
[\[48b.4\]]khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_dam pa dang /_dag pa dang /_grol ba dang /_nges par 'dzin par byed pa dang /_nem nur dang /_yid gnyis dang /_the tshom du shes par 'gyur zhing /_chags pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_rlom pa dang /_rmongs par 'gyur ro zhes gang gsungs pa der yang
[\[48b.5\]]'di skad du 'di ni gnas yod do/_/'di ni [#]gzhi yod do zhes 'byung bar 'gyur ba [#]zhig na/_de skad kyang mi 'byung ste/_de lta bas na 'di ni de'i don ma yin no/_/ci rnam pa bcu drug po 'di dag ming gi sgo nas sam/_'on te rdzas su zhe na/_kha cig na re rdzas su ni [#]bdun yin la ming gi sgo nas
[\[48b.6\]]ni bcu drug yin te/_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams rdzas su [#]re re yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/_/'di skad du brjod de rdzas su rnam pa bcu drug go/_/de la rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o/_/gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir sdug
[\[48b.7\]]bsngal ba'o/_/bdag gir lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis [#]stong pa'o/_/bdag tu lta ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bdag med pa'o/_/sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis rgyu'o/_/'byung ba'i chos kyi [#]tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o/_/'brel ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o/_/
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]mngon par sgrub pa'i don gyis ni [#]rkyen te/_dper na 'jim pa'i gong bu dang thal zhar dang 'khor lo dang thag gu dang chu rnams 'dus pa las bum pa mngon par grub pa de bzhin no/_/phung po zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o/_/me gsum zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'o/_/'tshe
[\[49a.2\]]ba med pa'i phyir gya nom pa'o/_/skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o/_/bgrod pa'i don gyis [#]lam mo/_/rigs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir rigs pa'o/_/yang dag par bsgrub pa'i don gyis sgrub [#]pa'o/_/shin tu yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin
[\[49a.3\]]par byed pa'o/_/yang na gtan du ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o/_/khur lta bur gyur pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal ba'o/_/nang gi skyes bu dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o/_/'dod dgur byed pa med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o/_/'ong ba'i tshul gyis rgyu'o/_/'byung ba'i tshul gyis kun 'byung ba'o/_/'phel
[\[49a.4\]]ba'i tshul gyis rab tu skye ba'o/_/so sor 'brad ba'i tshul [#]gyis rkyen no/_/'brel ba med pas 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o/_/'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang 'bral [#]ba'i phyir zhi ba'o/_/dge ba'i phyir gya nom pa'o/_/yid brtan [#]pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o/_/
[\[49a.5\]]lam ngan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis lam mo/_/rigs pa ma yin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis rigs pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong dang /_mi 'gal ba'i don gyis sgrub pa'o/_/srid pa thams cad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir nges par 'byin par byed pa'o/_/ji
[\[49a.6\]]ltar 'dod pa brjod par bya ste skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o/_/mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o/_/bdag dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o/_/bdag nyid kyis bdag ma yin pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o/_/rgyu dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_rab tu skye ba
[\[49a.7\]]dang /_rkyen nyid ni gang mdo las nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can/_'dun pa las kun 'byung ba/_'dun pa dang 'dra ba/_'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no zhes gsungs pa kho na yin te/_rab tu skye ba zhes bya ba'i sgra tha mar gdon pa 'ba' zhig tu
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]zad do/_/yang 'di dag la khyad par ci yod ce na/_'dun pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_nga'o snyam pa ni bye brag med par lus pa [#]'dun pa yin no/_/gyur cig snyam pa ni bye brag tu med par yang srid pa la 'dun pa yin no/_/'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa ni/_bye brag tu yang srid pa la
[\[49b.2\]]'dun pa yin no/_/bzhi pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'ching ba la 'dun pa yin no/_/yang na las mngon par 'du byed pa la 'dun pa yin no/_/de la dang po ni sdug bsngal gyi dang po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyu yin te/_'bras bu'i sa bon bzhin no/_/gnyis pa ni kun 'byung ba yin
[\[49b.3\]]te/_des de yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir/_'bras bu'i myu gu la sogs pa skye ba bzhin no/_/gsum pa ni de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rkyen yin te[#]/_'bras bu'i zhing dang chu dang lud la sogs pa bzhin no/_/zhing la sogs pa'i dbang gis ni 'bras bu'i dri dang ro dang /_nus pa dang /_
[\[49b.4\]]smin pa dang mthu dang ldan [#]par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi pa ni rab tu skye ba ste/_de kho na las [#]de skye ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i tha ma me tog bzhin no/_/yang na sred pa rnam par spyad pa rnams kyi [#]'dun pa bzhi ni sred pa'i bye brag [#]rnams las lnga tshan gnyis dang /_bzhi tshan gnyis yin te/_dge slong dag
[\[49b.5\]]nga'o snyam pa yod na nga 'di lta bu'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_nga ni [#]'di 'dra'o snyam pa dang /_nga de lta [#]ma yin no snyam pa dang /_nga bzang ngo snyam pa dang /_nga ngan no snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam par [#]'gyur zhing /_de la 'byung bar 'gyur bar mi [#]bya'o
[\[49b.6\]]snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_'di 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur bar [#]bya'o snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gyur cig snyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_de la 'di lta bur gyur cig
[\[49b.7\]]snyam pa dang /_de 'dra bar gyur cig snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang /_gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_'di [#]'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /_de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa [#]'byung bar 'gyur
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ro zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/'jug pa med pa'i phyir 'gog pa'o/_/sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir zhi ba ste/_dge slong dag de ltar na 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/gong na med pa'i phyir gya nom
[\[50a.2\]]pa'o/_/yang phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'o/_/lam lta bur gyur pa'i phyir lam mo/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du [#]zhugs pa'i phyir rigs pa'o/_/so sor nges pa'i phyir sgrub pa ste/_ji skad du mthong ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'di lam [#]yin gyi gzhan ni med do zhes
[\[50a.3\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gtan du nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir nges par 'byin pa'o/_/yang na rtag pa dang /_bde ba dang /_bdag gi dang /_bdag tu lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i
[\[50a.4\]]rnam pa dag [#]yin no/_/rgyu med pa dang /_rgyu gcig pu dang /_'gyur ba dang /_blo sngar btang ba dang /_lta ba [#]spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por go rims bzhin du rgyu dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_rab tu skye ba dang /_rkyen gyi rnam pa dag yin no[#]/_/thar pa med do snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams
[\[50a.5\]]kyi gnyen por 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no/_/sdug bsngal la thar pa yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por zhi ba'i rnam pa yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi bde ba gya nom pa yin par lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por gya nom pa yin no/_/yang dang yang yongs su nyams par
[\[50a.6\]]'gyur ba'i sgo nas thar ba ni gtan du ma yin no snyam du lta ba spyad pa rnams kyi gnyen por nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no/_/lam med do snyam pa dang /_lam 'di yin no snyam pa dang /_gzhan yang lam yin no snyam pa dang /_lam 'di yang lhag [#]go snyam du lta bar [#]spyad pa rnams kyi [#]
[\[50a.7\]]gnyen por go rims bzhin du lam dang /_regs pa dang /_sgrub pa dang /_nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa dag yin no/_/rnam pa zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ci zhe na/_rnam pa shes rab/_de lta na ni 'o na shes rab gzhan dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir/_shes rab rnam pa dang bcas
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]par mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar rnam pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'dzin pa'i bye brag ni [#]rnam pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs par 'gyur ro/_/yang ci shes rab kho nas 'dzin par byed dam zhe na/_smras pa ma yin no/_/'o na ji lta bu zhe na/_de dang bcas pa'i dmigs
[\[50b.2\]]pa dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed/_shes rab dang /_dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan thams cad kyis kyang 'dzin par byed do/_/yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin[#]/_/gang ci yod kyang rung thams cad gzung bar bya ba yin no/_/de ltar byas na shes rab ni rnam pa yang yin/_'dzin
[\[50b.3\]]par byed pa yang yin/_gzung bar bya ba yang yin no/_/dmigs pa dang bcas pa gzhan ni 'dzin par byed pa dang /_gzung bar bya ba yin no/_/dmigs pa med pa rnams ni gzung bar bya ba kho na yin no/_/'di man chad ni shes pa bcu po 'di dag gi dge ba la sogs pa'i bye brag
[\[50b.4\]]bstan par bya ste/_dang po rnam gsum gzhan rnams dge_/kun rdzob shes pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i dang po ni [#]yod pa'i phyir dang po ste/_de ni [#]dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa dang rnam pa gsum yin no/_/shes pa gzhan dgu ni dge ba kho na yin no/_/dang po sa
[\[50b.5\]]rnams thams cad na/_'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar na yod do/_/drug na chos shes bya/_chos shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mi lcogs pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan khyad par can na yod do/_/dgu na rjes shes bya ba/_rjes su shes pa ni sa drug po de dag nyid dang
[\[50b.6\]]gzugs med pa gsum na yod do/_/de bzhin du drug_/sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dang /_zad pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyang bye brag med par ni sa dgu po de dag nyid na yod do/_/dbye ba [#]ni chos shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa drug na yod do/_/
[\[50b.7\]]rjes su shes pas bsdus pa rnams ni sa dgu na yod do/_/[#]gzhan yid shes pa bsam gtan bzhi/_/pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni bsam gtan bzhi kho na na [#]yod kyi gzhan na med do/_/de na [#]'dod dang gzugs rten can/_/pha rol gyi sems shes pa de ni 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]khams dag tu mngon sum du byed do/_/chos shes bya ba 'dod rten can/_/chos shes pa ni 'dod [#]pa'i khams kyi rten can kho na yin gyi/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu ni mngon sum du mi byed do/_/khams gsum pa yi rten can gzhan/_/gzhan gang zhe
[\[51a.2\]]na/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_chos shes pa ma gtogs pa'o/_/sa dag [#]dang rten bshad zin to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis bsdus pa brjod par bya ste/_de smras pa/_'gog blo dran pa nyer gzhag pa[#]/_/gcig ste blo dang shes rab dang /_/shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam
[\[51a.3\]]grangs yin no/_/'gog pa shes pa ni gcig ste/_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/_/pha rol gyi [#]sems blo ni gsum mo/_/pha rol gyi sems shes pa ni gsum ste[#]/_tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no/_/lhag ma bzhi yin no/_/
[\[51a.4\]]'gog pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dag las gzhan pa'i shes pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no/_/shes pa gang gis dmigs pa [#]shes pa du zhig yin zhe na[#]/_chos blo'i spyod yul dgu yin no/_/chos shes pa'i dmigs [#]pa ni shes pa dgu yin
[\[51a.5\]]te/_rjes su shes pa ma gtogs so/_/lam rjes blo yi dgu yin no/_/rjes su shes pa'i dmigs pa yang shes pa dgu [#]yin te/_chos [#]shes pa ma gtogs so/_/lam shes pa'i dmigs pa yang dgu yin te/_kun rdzob shes pa ma gtogs so/_/sdug bsngal rgyu blo'i gnyis yin
[\[51a.6\]]no/_sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung shes pa dag gi [#]dmigs pa dag [#]ni gnyis te/_kun rdzob dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa yin no/_/bzhi yi bcu yin/_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa rnams kyi dmigs pa ni shes pa
[\[51a.7\]]bcu char yang [#]yin no/_/gcig gi min/_'gog pa shes pa ni [#]gcig pu'i dmigs pa ni shes pa [#]ma yin pa nyid do/_/chos bcu dag ni sbyar bar bya/_bcu gang dag ce na/_khams gsum pa dang dri med chos/_/'dus ma byas rnams gnyis gnyis so/_/chos 'dus byas rnams la
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa brgyad du bya'o/_/'dus ma byas rnams la dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis su bya'o/_/chos bcu po
[\[51b.2\]]'di dag ji ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na/_shes pa gang gis dmigs pa du zhig yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste/_de la kun rdzob shes pa'i dmigs pa ni [#]chos bcu po thams cad yin no/_/chos shes pa ni lnga ste/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_gzhi dang /_'dus ma byas dge ba
[\[51b.3\]]yin no/_/rjes su shes pa [#]ni bdun te/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_drug dang /_'dus ma byas dge ba yin no/_/sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung shes pa dag gi ni drug ste/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams
[\[51b.4\]]yin no/_/'gog pa shes pa'i ni gcig ste/_'dus ma byas dge ba kho na [#]yin no/_/lam shes pa'i ni gnyis te/_zag pa med pa dag yin no/_/gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i ni gsum ste/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs [#]na spyod pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams
[\[51b.5\]]yin no/_/zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa dag gi dmigs pa ni chos dgu yin te/_'dus ma byas lung du ma bstan pa ma gtogs so/_/shes pa gcig gis chos thams cad shes par 'gyur ba yod dam zhe na/_med do/_/'on kyang /_kun rdzob gcig pus rang tshogs las/_/gzhan ni bdag
[\[51b.6\]]med nyid rigs 'gyur/_/kun rdzob shes pas ni rang gi tshogs las gzhan pa'i chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes bdag med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rang gi tshogs ni rang gi ngo bo dang de dang lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i chos rnams yin te[#]/_de dag ni yul dang yul can [#]tha
[\[51b.7\]]dad pa'i phyir dang /_dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir dang /_ha cang nye ba'i phyir mi 'dzin to/_/de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa ni thos pa dang /_bsam pa las byung ba yin no/_/gzugs na spyod pa ni thos pa las byung ba yin no/_/bsgom pa las byung ba ni ma yin te[#]/_de ni sa rnam par chad pa las
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta ma yin na thams cad las cig car 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rdzogs so//_//[#]gang zhig shes pa du dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya ste/_re zhig so so'i skye bo ni
[\[52a.2\]]kun rdzob shes pa gcig pu dang ldan no/_/'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang yang ldan no/_/'phags pa ni/_zag med skad cig dang po la/_/chags can shes pa gcig dang ldan/_/'dod pa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na/_sdug
[\[52a.3\]]bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa la kun rdzob shes pa gcig kho na dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnyis pa la gsum/_sdug bsngal la [#]chos shes pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal shes pa ste/_gsum dang ldan no/_/yan chad ni/_bzhi la re re 'phel
[\[52a.4\]]dang ldan/_/de yan chad kyi skad cig ma bzhi la ni/_de la [#]shes pa re re/_'phel bar shes par bya ste/_sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa la ni rjes su shes pa 'phel la/_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam la chos shes pa rnams [#]la ni kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam
[\[52a.5\]]shes pa rnams 'phel bas lam la chos shes pa la shes pa bdun dang ldan pa yin no/_/'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni thams cad du gzhan gyi sems shes pa lhag par ldan par rig par bya'o/_/yang na [#]gnas skabs gang du shes pa du dag cig 'thob [#]ce na/_mthong
[\[52a.6\]]ba'i lam la bzod pa dang /_/shes pa ji ltar skyes pa rnams/_/ma 'ongs pa 'thob/_mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa'am/_shes pa gang dang gang skyes pa de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa de'i rnam pa bzhi kho na 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir/_mthong ba'i lam la shes pa dang /_/
[\[52a.7\]]rnam pa [#]'dra ba kho na 'thob ce na/_rigs rnams ma thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid las/_rjes gsum la ni kun rdzob kyang [#]/_/mthong ba'i lam de nyid la sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa la rjes su shes pa gsum la kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo/_/chos shes pa
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]la ni ma yin te/_bden pa zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir [#]mngon rtogs mtha' zhes bya/_de nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob shes pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba [#]zhes bya ste/_bden pa re re mngon par rtogs pa'i rjes la 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i
[\[52b.2\]]phyir lam la rjes su shes pa na 'thob bar mi 'gyur zhe na/_lam gyi bden pa ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis [#]mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang [#]/_zad par mngon par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/sdug bsngal zad par yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_kun 'byung spang bar bya ba
[\[52b.3\]]dang /_'gog pa mngon du [#]bya bar ni [#]nus kyi/_lam ni zad par bsgom par [#]mi nus pas mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' [#]med pa'i phyir/_de ni [#]mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba mi 'thob [#]bo/_/de'i tshe [#]kun 'byung ba la [#]yang thams cad spangs pa [#]ma yin pas mngon par
[\[52b.4\]]rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/_de'i bden pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba thams cad spangs pa yin no/_/lam ni rigs mang ba'i phyir/_mthong bas spang [#]ba'i gnyen por [#]thams cad bsgom par mi nus pas khyad par cher yod do/_/gzhan dag na re
[\[52b.5\]]mthong ba'i lam gyi [#]'khor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/_/[#]'di ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no/_/ci kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de res 'ga' mngon sum du byed dam zhe na/_nam yang mi byed de/_gcig kho nar de
[\[52b.6\]]ni mi skye ba'i chos can yin/_ji ltar na de thob pa [#]yin te/_ma rnyed pa las rnyed pa'i phyir ro/_/da [#]ni gal te de mngon sum du bya ba mi nus pa kho na yin na ji ltar na de rnyed pa yin/_thob pa'i sgo nas so/_/gang gi phyir rnyed pa de'i phyir rnyed do zhes ston pa 'di ni sngon ma byung ba'i rnam pa yin no/_/de
[\[52b.7\]]lta bas na de lta na [#]ni thob pa mi 'grub pa [#]nyid kyis sngon [#]gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer ba de lta na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi slob dpon dag ji skad zer zhe na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi [#]mthus de las langs nas 'jig rten pa'i shes pa ches khyad par du 'phags
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]pa bden pa la dmigs pa [#]mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba [#]kun rdzob shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de mngon sum du 'gyur bar nus pa'i rten rnyed pa gang yin pa de nyid rnyed pa yin te/_rigs rnyed na rigs las byung ba yang rnyed pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/bye brag tu smra ba
[\[53a.2\]]rnams ni 'di mi 'dod do/_/sa du pa'i kun rdzob shes pa de 'thob ce na[#]/_mthong ba'i lam gyis ni/_rang dang 'gog pa [#]mthong ba'i lam las sa gang pa [#]yin pa sa de pa dang /_sa 'og ma pa'i kun rdzob shes pa 'thob [#]ba ste/_gal te mthong ba'i lam [#]mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa
[\[53a.3\]]zhig yin na ni/_mi lcogs pa med pa'i sa pa dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_sa gnyis pa [#]thob la/_de bzhin du mthong ba'i lam/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin na sa bdun pa'i kun rdzob shes pa thob pa'i bar du'o/_/de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa du dag cig yin
[\[53a.4\]]zhe na/_'gog pa'i mtha'/_'gog pa'i [#]mngon par rtogs pa'i kun rdzob shes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa tha ma ste/_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no/_/gcig grangs [#]bcad pas lhag ma ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi char yin no zhes bya bar grub pa
[\[53a.5\]]yin no/_/kun rdzob shes pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba de ni rang bden rnams [#]can/_bden pa gang zhig mngon par rtogs pa'i 'thob pa bden pa de'i rnam pa can kho na yin no/_/de'i rnam pa can yin no/_/zhes smos pas 'di'i dmigs pa yang bden pa de nyid
[\[53a.6\]]yin no zhes bshad pa yin no/_/de ni [#]mthong ba'i lam gyis 'thob [#]par bya ba yin pa'i phyir 'bad las byung ba sbyor ba las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa smos pa'i phyir/_'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa [#]ni phung po bzhi dang lnga'i rang bzhin
[\[53a.7\]]yin no/_/chags bcas bcu drug pa la drug_/'thob ces bya bar sbyar te/_'dod chags dang ma [#]bral ba ni bcu drug pa lam la rjes su shes pa las [#]shes pa gnyis da [#]ltar byung ba yin la/_ma 'ongs pa drug 'thob [#]ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang /_lam shes pa rnams so/_/'dod la chags dang bral bas bdun/_/'dod chags dang bral bas ni bdun pa [#]pha rol gyi sems shes pa [#]'thob bo/_/de yi gong ma chags bcas kyi/_/bsgom pa'i [#]lam la bdun 'thob po/_/skad cig ma bcu
[\[53b.2\]]drug gi gong ma'i [#]bsgom pa'i lam la ni ji srid du 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa de srid du sbyor ba dang /_bar chad med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_khyad par can gyi lam thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_
[\[53b.3\]]kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dang kun rdzob shes pa rnams so/_/gal te bsgom [#]pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no/_/gal te 'jig rten [#]las 'das pa zhig yin na ni/_chos shes pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin
[\[53b.4\]]no/_/sa bdun las rgyal mngon shes dang /_/mi g.yo 'thob dang spel bsgoms pa'i/_/bar chad med pa'i lam dag dang /_/gong ma'i grol [#]ba'i lam brgyad la'ang /_/shes pa bdun 'thob bo zhes bya bar sbyar te/_sa bdun ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa gsum mo/_/de dag
[\[53b.5\]]las [#]rgyal ba ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste/_slob pa sa [#]bdun po de dag las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga [#]dang /_mi g.yo ba [#]rtogs par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam ji snyed pa de dag [#]thams cad la shes pa bdun 'thob [#]ste/_
[\[53b.6\]]de dag nyid do/_/gal te bsgom pa'i lam 'jig rten pa zhig yin na ni/_kun rdzob shes pa da ltar byung ba yin no/_/'jig rten las 'das pa zhig yin na ni rjes su shes pa bzhi dang chos shes pa gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no/_/mi g.yo ba [#]rtogs par byed pa la ni kun rdzob shes pa mi 'thob
[\[53b.7\]]ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/der ni zad pa shes pa bdun pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i yang gong ma srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad la [#]yang shes pa bdun kho na 'thob ste/_chos
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa rnams so/_/kun rdzob shes pa ni mi 'thob ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rjes su shes pa rnam pa [#]bzhi dang /_chos
[\[54a.2\]]shes pa rnam pa [#]gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig da ltar byung ba yin no/_/slob pa sbyong ba'i grol ba la/_/shes pa [#]drug dang bdun 'thob bam/_/slob pa 'dod chags dang bcas pas ni dbang po sbyor ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la drug 'thob ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba [#]dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam shes pa rnams so/_/'dod chags dang bral bas ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsnan te/_bdun 'thob [#]bo/_/'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni kha cig na re [#]gnyi gas kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo zhes zer ba'i lugs tha dad pa
[\[54a.4\]]shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/sbyor ba'i lam la ni de gnyis [#]kyis kun rdzob shes pa yang 'thob bo/_/bar chad med pa'i lam la drug_/slob pa 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rung /_'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang rung /_dbang po sbyor [#]ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam la drug 'thob ste/_snga
[\[54a.5\]]ma bzhin no/_/kun rdzob shes pa ni ma yin te/_mthong ba'i lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang ma yin te/_bar chad med pa'i lam thams cad la bkag pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir bkag pa ci zhe [#]na/_gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin srid rtse'i rnam rgyal la[#]/_/
[\[54a.6\]]srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la yang de bzhin du drug 'thob bo/_/zad pa shes pa la dgu'o/_/srid pa'i rtse mo las [#]'dod chags dang bral ba la [#]rnam par grol ba'i [#]lam dgu pa ni zad pa shes pa yin te/_de la mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs
[\[54a.7\]]pa shes pa dgu 'thob bo/_/mi g.yo bas ni bcu 'thob bo/_/mi g.yo ba'i chos can gang yin pa des ni bcu 'thob ste/_mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro/_/der 'pho ba'i grol ba tha ma la'ang /_/gang zhig mi g.yo ba nyid du 'pho ba de'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma la yang bcu 'thob
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]bo/_/bshad pa'i lhag ma la [#]brgyad 'thob bo/_/lhag ma yang gang zhig ce na/_'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa dang /_sa bdun las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_mngon par shes pa dang [#]spel mar bsgom pa dag gis [#]rnam par grol ba'i
[\[54b.2\]]lam rnams dang /_mi g.yo ba rtogs par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam brgyad dang /_'dod chags dang [#]bral ba'i sbyor ba dang /_khyad par can gyi lam thams cad de/_de dag thams cad la ni zad pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa ma gtogs [#]pa shes pa brgyad ma 'ongs pa 'thob pas 'thob
[\[54b.3\]]pa [#]ste/_slob pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/mi slob pa'i mngon pa [#]shes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_khyad par can gyi lam rnams la shes pa dgu'am bcu 'thob po/_/mngon par shes pa dang spel mar bsgom pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam rnams la ni brgyad dam
[\[54b.4\]]dgu 'thob po/_/mngon par shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa cung zad kyang mi 'thob bo/_/so so'i skye bo [#]ni 'dod pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i lam tha ma rnams dang /_bsam gtan
[\[54b.5\]]gyis pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa gsum gyi rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams dang /_tshad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mngon par sgrub pa rnams la [#]kun rdzob shes pa ma 'ongs pa dang /_nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dag gi sbyor ba rnams dang /_
[\[54b.6\]]mngon par shes pa gsum gyi [#]rnam par grol ba ma gtogs pa pha rol gyi sems shes pa yang 'thob bo/_/de dag la ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa yang [#]mi 'thob ste/_mthong ba'i lam gyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sngon med pa'i lam thob [#]pa gzhan la ni kun rdzob shes pa kho na ma 'ongs pa
[\[54b.7\]]'thob bo/_/yang lam gang la sa du pa'i shes pa thob [#]ce na/_re zhig kun rdzob shes pa ni [#]lam sa gang pa'i [#]yin pa dang /_dang po nyid du sa gang 'thob pa sa de pa'i ma 'ongs pa [#]'thob bo/_/zag pa med pa'i lam gang [#]yin pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do/_/'o na ji lta bu zhe na/_gang las
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]chags bral bya phyir gang /_/'thob pa der yang 'og ma'ang [#]'thob/_/sa gang las 'dod chags dang bral [#]ba la yang lam yang sbyor ba'i lam la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis yin la/_'dod chags dang bral ba sa gang zhig thob [#]pa de'i sa pa dang sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa med pa'i shes pa
[\[55a.2\]]rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/zad pa shes la zag bcas kyang /_/sa kun zad pa shes pa la ni zad pa shes pas 'thob pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i yon tan mi sdug pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa la
[\[55a.3\]]sogs pas thams cad sprog ma thag pa bcad de/_dbugs phyin pa lta bu dang /_chos mthun pa 'thob ste/_rgyal srid chen po thob na/_yul gyi mi rnams kyis [#]dbul bar bya bas [#]bsu ba bzhin du rang gi sems la rgyal srid chen po nyid 'thob pa la dge ba'i chos thams cad 'thob pa rnams kyis
[\[55a.4\]]bsu ba'i phyir ro/_/gang ci rnyed pa de thams cad 'thob bam zhe na/_smras pa/_gang sngon med pa las rnyed pa yin pas/_de thams cad ni 'thob kyi/_sngon rnyed zin pa ni mi 'thob bo/_/gang rnam par nyams pa las yang rnyed pa de yang mi 'thob ste/_thob [#]pa btang ba'i phyir ro/_/ci 'thob pa rnyed pa
[\[55a.5\]]kho na yin nam zhe na/_smras pa ma yin no/_/'thob pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/_nyen [#]pa 'thob pa dang /_bsten [#]pa 'thob pa dang /_gnyen po 'thob pa dang /_thag bsring ba 'thob ba'o/_/[#]de la rnyed pa dang bsten [#]ces bya ba ni/_dge ba 'dus byas 'thob bo[#]/_/gnyen po dang ni thag bsring ba'i[#]/_/
[\[55a.6\]]'thob pa zag dang bcas pa'i yin/_/rnyed pa dang bsten [#]pa 'thob pa dag ni dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyi yin te/_ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi ni gcig go/_/da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ni gnyi ga'o[#]/_/gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa dag ni/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin te/_de ltar
[\[55a.7\]]na dge ba [#]zag pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi ni 'thob pa bzhi yin no/_/zag pa med pa rnams dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi ni gnyis [#]yin no/_/chos mngon pa pa nyi 'og pa rnams kyi ltar na 'thob pa drug ste/_bzhi po de dag dang /_sdom pa 'thob pa
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dang /_rnam par 'jig pa 'thob pa'o/_/[#]snga ma ni dbang po rnams kyi yin la/_phyi ma ni lus kyi yin te[#]/_dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang /_shin tu bsgoms [#]pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_de bzhin du lus 'di la skra yang yod ces bya ba [#]rgyas par gsungs pa yin no/_/gang dag kha che
[\[55b.2\]]ba rnams na re de gnyis ni gnyen po dang thag bsring ba 'thob pa'i khongs su 'dus so zhes zer ro/_/gang zag thams cad kyis zad pa shes pa'i tshe/_yon tan 'thob pa'i phyir [#]bshad kyi/_/sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/stobs la sogs pa bco brgyad do/_/gang dag sangs
[\[55b.3\]]rgyas kho nas zad pa mkhyen pa'i tshe brnyes par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o/_/bco brgyad gang zhe na/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po'o/_/thun mong ma yin pas na ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o/_/de la/_gnas
[\[55b.4\]]dang gnas min shes pa bcu/_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa bcu yin no/_/las 'bras la brgyad/_las dang rnam par smin pa'am mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa brgyad de/_'gog pa dang lam shes pa dag [#]ma gtogs so/_/bsam gtan sogs/_
[\[55b.5\]]dbang po mos dang khams la ni/_dgu'o/_/bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni shes pa dgu yin te/_'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so/_/dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_mos pa
[\[55b.6\]]sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/lam dag la bcu'am/_'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dgu'am zhes lugs tha dad pa'i don te/_gal te lam de [#]'bras bu dang bcas par gzung [#]na ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i
[\[55b.7\]]lam mkhyen pa'i stobs shes pa bcu'o[#]/_/gal te ma yin na ni dgu ste/_'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so/_/gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa yin/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /_shi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun rdzob shes pa yin no/_/zad pa
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]drug gam bcu yin no/_/gal te zag pa zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa [#]kho na zhig yin na ni [#]zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs shes pa drug yin te/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes
[\[56a.2\]]pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa rnams so/_/'on te zad pa shes pa zag pa zad pa'i rgyud [#]la yod pa'i shes pa yin na ni/_des na shes pa bcu yin no/_/rang bzhin bshad zin to/_/da ni sa brjod par bya ste/_sngon gnas shi 'pho skye ba'i [#]stobs/_/bsam gtan dag na/_'chi 'pho ba ni
[\[56a.3\]]'chi 'pho ba kho na ste/_sngon gyi gnas dang /_shi 'pho dang [#]skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gtan bzhi'i sa pa yin no/_/lhag ma ni sa rnams kun na[#]/_/stobs lhag ma ni sa thams cad kyis bsdus pa yin te/_de dag kyang 'dod pa'i khams dang /_mi lcogs [#]pa med pa dang /_
[\[56a.4\]]bsam gtan [#]khyad par can dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa'o/_/thams cad kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa'i rten can yin te/_gzhan du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/shes pa rnam pa bcu po 'di nyid gzhan gyi [#]ni stobs zhes mi bya'o/_sangs rgyas kho na'i
[\[56a.5\]]stobs zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir/_'di'i stobs gang phyir thogs mi mnga'/_/gang gi [#]phyir 'di'i mkhyen pa shes [#]bya thams cad la thogs pa mi mnga' bar 'jug pa de'i phyir stobs yin no/_/gzhan dag gi [#]shes pa ni la lar 'dod kyang mi 'jug pa'i phyir/_thogs pa yin pas de
[\[56a.6\]]ni stobs zhes bya ba'i ming thob [#]par 'os pa ma yin te/_'dir dpe ni gnas brtan shA ri'i bus rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i mi phyir btang ba dang /_bya zhig khras gtses pa skye ba la sogs pa'i mtha' [#]ma shes pa lta bu yin no/_/re zhig de ltar na mkhyen pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir/_sangs
[\[56a.7\]]rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi stobs ni shes [#]bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no/_/sku la sred med bu yi stobs/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku la ni sred med bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes brjod do/_/gzhan dag tshigs na/_gzhan dag na re tshigs dang tshigs [#]na sred med kyi bu'i stobs mnga'o zhes zer ro/_/btsun pa na re
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]sku'i stobs kyang thugs kyi stobs bzhin du mtha' yas pa yin no/_/de lta ma yin na mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pas [#]bzod par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi tshigs kyi [#]mdud pa dang /_lu gu brgyud dang /_gzar [#]bus btab pa lta
[\[56b.2\]]bu dag yin no/_/sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi tshad ji tsam zhe na/_glang chen sogs bdun cus glags pa'i stobs yin no/_/glang po che phal pa bcu'i stobs gang yin pa de ni spos kyi glang po che gcig gi stobs yin no/_/de bzhin du tshan po che chen po dang /_rab gnon dang /_yan lag mchog
[\[56b.3\]]dang /_stobs mchog dang /_sred med kyi bu rnams gong nas gong du bcu 'gyur du bskyed de [#]brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re glang po che phal ba dang /_spos kyi glang po che [#]dang /_tshan po che chen po dang /_rab gnon dang /_yan lag mchog dang /_stobs mchog rnams gong nas gong du
[\[56b.4\]]bcu 'gyur du bskyed pa [#]ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs kyi phyed yin la/_de gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sred med kyi bu'i stobs yin no zhes zer te/_ji ltar ches che ba de ltar rung ngo /_/de ni reg bya'i skye mched do/_/lus kyi stobs de ni thams cad kyang reg bya'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba chen
[\[56b.5\]]po'i khyad par kho na yin par rig par bya'o/_/gzhan dag na re bdun las don gzhan du gyur pa rgyur byas pa'i [#]gzugs yin no zhes zer ro/_/stobs rnams bshad zin to/_/mi 'jigs [#]pa ni rnam pa bzhi/_/mdo las ji skad 'byung ba [#]bzhin no/_/mi 'jigs [#]pa bzhi po de dag
[\[56b.6\]]kyang /_ji ltar stobs ni dang po dang bcu pa gnyis pa [#]bdun pa bzhin no/_/[#]gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta [#]bar/_kye ma nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs [#]pa 'di yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i
[\[56b.7\]]stobs ji lta bar kye ma nga [#]zag pa zad par gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o/_/las bdag gir bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang dag nyan thos rnam [#]la bar du gcod pa'i chos su gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs [#]pa 'di yang de dang 'dra'o/_/kun
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs ji lta bar ngas gang nyan thos rnams kyi nges par 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs pa la zhes bya ba'i mi 'jigs pa 'di [#]yang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/_/ji ltar na mkhyen pa nyid mi 'jigs pa yin zhe na/_mi 'jigs pa ni mi
[\[57a.2\]]skrag pa yin la/_'di dag gis kyang mi skrag par 'gyur ro/_/shes pas byas pa ni mi 'jigs par rung gi shes pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/dran pa nye bar [#]gzhag pa ni 'khor gyi bye brag las gsum yin te/_mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin no/_/[#]de yang dran pa shes rab dag [#]nyid gsum/_/
[\[57a.3\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po 'di dag ni dran pa dang /_shes bzhin gyi rang bzhin dag yin no/_/gang gi tshe nyan thos dag [#]kyang gus par [#]nyan pa dang /_gus par mi nyan pa dang /_gnyi ga la kun du dga' ba'am/_kun nas mnar sems mi 'byung ba na/_ci'i phyir/_'di
[\[57a.4\]]dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya zhe na/_bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/yang na nyan thos rnams gang [#]yin pa de la ni gus par nyan pa dang /_gus par mi nyan pa dang /_gnyis po de dag la shin tu yang yid bde ba la sogs pa'i go skabs su mi [#]
[\[57a.5\]]'gyur gyi/_gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas de [#]kho na la de mi 'byung ba ya mtshan du rnam par gzhag gi gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/da ni thugs rje chen po brjod par bya ste/_de smras pa/_thugs rje chen po kun rdzob blo/_/thugs rje chen po ni kun rdzob shes pa'i bdag nyid yin no/_/de lta ma
[\[57a.6\]]yin na sems can thams cad la dmigs par yang mi 'grub la/_snying rje bzhin du sdug bsngal gsum gyi rnam pa can du yang mi 'grub bo/_/'di ci'i phyir thugs rje chen po zhes bya zhe na/_tshogs dang rnam pa spyod yul dang /_/mnyam pa'i phyir dang ches che'i phyir/_/tshogs ni bsod
[\[57a.7\]]nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen pos yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa ni sdug bsngal gsum la rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/dmigs pa ni khams gsum pa'i sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/mnyam pa nyid ni sems can thams cad la 'dra bar 'jug pa'i phyir
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ro/_/ches che ba nyid ni de bas [#]che ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/snying rje dang thugs rje chen po gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ni ci zhig yod ce na/_tha dad bya ba rnam pa brgyad/_ngo bo nyid [#]las ni zhe sdang med pa dang /_gti mug med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rnam pa las ni sdug bsngal
[\[57b.2\]]gcig dang /_gsum gyi rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir ro/_/dmigs pa las ni khams gcig dang /_gsum gyi sems can la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/sa las ni bsam gtan bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rgyud las ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang /_
[\[57b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/thob pa las ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral bas thob pa'i phyir ro/_/yongs su mi skyob pa dang /_yongs su skyob pa dang /_mi 'dra ba dang 'dra bar thugs rje mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/ci sangs
[\[57b.4\]]rgyas thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa [#]yin nam zhe na/_sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang ni/_/chos sku 'gro ba'i don spyod pas/_/mnyam pa nyid de sku tshe dang /_/rigs dang sku bong tshod kyis min/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu gsum po sngon gyi bsod nams dang /_
[\[57b.5\]]ye shes kyi tshogs kyis [#]yang dag par 'grub pa dang /_chos kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi don spyod pas [#]mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/sku tshe dang /_rigs dang /_gdung dang /_sku bong tshod du mdzad pa la ni bye brag yod de dus ji lta ba bzhin du yun shin tu ring ba dang /_thung ngur 'tsho
[\[57b.6\]]ba'i phyir dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs tha dad pa'i phyir dang /_'od srungs dang shAkya la sogs pa gdung tha dad pa'i phyir dang /_sku bong tshod chung ba dang /_chung ba ma yin pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro/_/phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di kho na yid la byed pa [#]mkhas pas
[\[57b.7\]]ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba dang /_gus pa chen po skyed par nus te/_'di lta ste/_rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ye shes phun sum tshogs [#]pa'o/_/de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]ni/_rnam pa bzhi ste/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la goms pa dang /_yun ring po nas goms pa dang /_bar chad med par goms pa dang /_gus par byas te goms pa'o/_/'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_ye shes phun sum
[\[58a.2\]]tshogs pa dang /_spang ba [#]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang [#]rnam pa bzhi ste/_ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gtan du thar bar [#]mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/
[\[58a.3\]]yang na theg pa gsum dang bde 'gro la 'god par mdzad pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_ma bstan par mkhyen pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_ma 'bad par mkhyen pa'o/_/spangs pa phun sum
[\[58a.4\]]tshogs pa [#]yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_gtan du spangs pa dang /_bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'o/_/mthu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_phyi'i yul sprul
[\[58a.5\]]pa dang /_yongs su bsgyur ba dang /[ #]sku tshe gtong ba dang /_byin gyis rlob pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sgrib pa dang nam mkha' dang shin tu ring ba la myur du gshegs pa dang /_chung ngur [#]mang po 'jug par mdzad pa'i mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ya mtshan gyi chos nar ma rnam
[\[58a.6\]]pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/gzugs kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sku gdung rdo rje ltar sra ba nyid [#]phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de ltar na de
[\[58a.7\]]dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid mdor bsdus pa yin no/_/de dbye na ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te/_de yang bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na [#]nas gal te sku tshe bskal pa grangs med pa du mar byin gyis brlabs [#]par gyur na mtha' dag mkhyen pa dang brjod par spyod do/_/re zhig
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan dang ye shes dang mthu dang phan 'dogs pa mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba ni [#]rin po che chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no/_/'on kyang byis pa rang nyid yon tan dbul bas mos pa bcom [#]pa rnams ni yon tan 'byor pa de lta bu de thos su [#]zin kyang sangs
[\[58b.2\]]rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par mi byed kyi/_mkhas pa rnams ni rkang yan chad nas kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par rab tu dang bar 'gyur te/_gcig tu rab tu dang ba de dag ni dang ba tsam gyis kyang rnam par smin par ma nges pa'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan te lha [#]
[\[58b.3\]]dang mi'i legs pa nyams su myong nas bgrod [#]par bya ba'i mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bsod nams kyi zhing [#]bla na med pa zhes bya [#]ste/_'bras bu med pa ma yin pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba [#]dang /_mchog tu gyur pa dang /_myur ba dang /_
[\[58b.4\]]mtha' bzang ba'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /_gang dag rgyal ba rnam 'dren la/_/bya ba chung ngu byed 'gyur ba'ang /_/de dag mtho ris sna tshogs dag_/bgrod nas bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob/_/ces gsungs so/_/re zhig de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
[\[58b.5\]]brgyad ces bya'o/_/chos gzhan slob dang thun mong min[#]/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dag ni nyan thos dang thun mong yin no/_/kha cig so so'i skye bo dang /_de dag kyang gang zhe na/_ci rigs par/_nyon mongs med dang smon nas shes/_/so so [#]yang dag rig sngon [#]
[\[58b.6\]]sogs/_/nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /_zad par gyi skye mched
[\[58b.7\]]la sogs pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa la sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa las rab tu skye ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang yon gnas [(]gyi [,]kyi[)#]khyad par yin par rig nas pha rol po dag de la dmigs nas/_nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spangs
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]par 'dod de[#]/_gang gis na pha rol po dag rnam pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa skye bar [#]mi byed cing 'ga' yang de la dmigs nas 'dod chags sam/_zhe sdang ngam/_nga rgyal skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa ste/_lam de ni 'ga'
[\[59a.2\]]yang nyon mongs pa skyed [#]par mi byed pas na nyon mongs pa med pa yin no/_/nyon mongs pa med pa de ni/_kun rdzob shes/_de'i rang bzhin ni 'di yin no/_/bsam gtan mtha' na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa yin te[#]/_lam sla ba rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mi g.yo ba'i
[\[59a.3\]]chos/_dgra bcom pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/_gzhan ni res 'ga' rang gi rgyud las kyang nyon mongs pa mtha' dag [#]yongs su spang bar mi nus so/_/mis skyed/_gling gsum du mi dag gi nang kho nar skyed par byed do/_/[#]nyon mongs 'dod [#]gtogs pa[#]/_ma skyed gzhir [#]bcas spyod
[\[59a.4\]]yul can/_'di'i dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa ma 'ongs pa gzhi [#]dang bcas pa rnams yin te/_pha rol po dag nyon mongs pa skye bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba de ltar zhugs pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa gzhi [#]med pa rnams ni yongs su spang bar mi nus te/_thams cad du 'gro
[\[59a.5\]]ba rnams ni rang gi sa mtha' dag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/nyon mongs pa med pa [#]ji skad du bshad pa/_smon nas shes pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de [#]yang kun rdzob shes pa dang /_/bsam gtan mtha' na yod pa dang /_/mi g.yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang /_mi'i rten can [#]yin no/_/de'i dmigs pa
[\[59a.6\]]thams cad do/_/smon nas shes pa'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad yin pas 'di ni bye brag yin no/_/bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re smon nas shes pa [#]gzugs med pa rnams mngon sum du [#]mi shes so/_/'o na ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyu mthun pa dang spyod pa'i bye brag [#]las shes te/_'dir dpe ni zhing
[\[59a.7\]]pa lta bu'o zhes zer ro/_/smon pa sngar btang ba'i shes pa ni smon nas shes pa ste/_'di shes par bya'o snyam du smon nas rab kyi mtha'i [#]bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug cing /_ting nge 'dzin de'i yul du ji tsam zhig gyur pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba [#]bzhin du rab tu [#]shes pa'o/_/
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]de bzhin chos don nges tshig dang /_/spobs pa so so yang dag rig_/so so yang dag par rig pa ni bzhi ste/_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de dag kyang
[\[59b.2\]]nyon mongs pa med pa [#]ji lta ba de dang 'dra'o/_/de dag gi de dang 'dra ba ci zhe na/_mi g.yo ba'i chos can gyi yin pa dang /_mi'i rten can nyid yin no/_/'di dag gi dmigs pa dang /_sa dang /_rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag ni tha dad par brjod de/_gsum ni go rims bzhin ming dang /_/don dang ngag la
[\[59b.3\]]thogs med shes/_/chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni go rims bzhin du ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang /_don dang ngag la [#]thogs pa med par shes pa yin no/_/bzhi pa rigs [#]pa thags thogs med/_/mngon brjod lam la dbang nyid dang /_/
[\[59b.4\]]thogs pa med par shes pa zhes bya bar sbyar te/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni rigs [#]pa dang /_thags [#]thogs med par mngon par brjod pa nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin la dbang [#]gsal bar bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa yin no/_/de yi dmigs pa ngag dang
[\[59b.5\]]lam/_/de'i dmigs pa [#]ni ngag kyang yin la lam yang yin no/_/shes pa dgu'o/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes pa dgu'i rang bzhin yin te/_'gog pa shes pa ma gtogs so/_/sa thams cad/_'di ni ngag dang lam [#]gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig la
[\[59b.6\]]dmigs pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar sa thams cad pa yang yin no/_/yang dag don rig bcu'am drug_/don so so yang dag par [#]rig pa ni gal te don chos thams cad yin na ni [#]shes pa bcu yin no/_/gal te don mya ngan las 'das pa yin na ni shes pa
[\[59b.7\]]drug ste/_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su shes pa dang /_'gog pa dang zad pa dang mi skye ba dang /_kun rdzob shes pa rnams so/_/don [#]ni kun na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa de ni sa thams cad pa yin no/_/gzhan kun rdzob/_gzhan chos dang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]rig pa gnyis ni kun rdzob shes pa'i rang bzhin dag yin te[#]/_ming gi tshogs la sogs pa dang /_ngag la dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos rig 'dod dang bsam gtan na/_/chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni [#]sa lnga po 'dod pa'i khams dang /_bsam gtan bzhis
[\[60a.2\]]bsdus pa yin te/_yan chad na ming gi tshogs med pa'i phyir ro/_/ngag ni 'dod pa [#]dang po na/_/ngag dang nges pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni don gcig go/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa dag yin te/_yan chad na rtogs [#]
[\[60a.3\]]pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/btags pa [#]ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'di skad du tshig dang yi ge dang /_de nyid kyi [#]don dang /_de nyid [#]kyi gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang pho dang mo la [#]sogs pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /_de la thags thogs med par bya ba la thogs pa med par shes pa ni chos so so yang dag par
[\[60a.4\]]rigs [#]pa la sogs pa yin no zhes ston te/_de nyid kyis 'di dag gi go rims grub pa yin no/_/tshig nges pa ni nges pa'i tshig ste/_dper na gzugs su rung bas ni [#]de'i phyir/_gzugs zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yin no/_/gzhan dag na re lan dang lan la spobs pas na spobs pa yin
[\[60a.5\]]no zhes zer ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa [#]'di dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba ni go rims bzhin du rtsis dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_sgra rig pa dang /_gtan tshigs rig pa dag yin te/_'di dag la mkhas par ma byas par de dag skyed [#]par mi nus so zhes grag go/_/thams cad
[\[60a.6\]]kyi sbyor ba sangs rgyas kyi bka' kho na yin no [#]zhes brjod do/_/gang la gcig yod pa de la gdon mi za bar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi char yod do/_/[#]ma tshang bar ni de thob med/_/de dag ma tshang bar ni so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob pa ma yin no/_/nyon mongs pa med pa
[\[60a.7\]]la sogs pa'i yon tan bstan pa gang dag yin pa/_drug po de dag rab mtha' bas/_/de dag ni rab kyi mtha' pa'i bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis 'thob po/_/de ni rnam drug_/bsam gtan bzhi pa rab kyi [#]mtha' pa de yang [#]nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]rig pa gsum dang /_rab kyi mtha' pa de nyid dang drug gi bdag nyid yin no/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni de'i stobs kyis [#]'thob pa yin gyi de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa ni ma yin no/_/rab kyi mtha' pa zhes bya ba ni [#]ci zhe na/_bsam gtan mtha'/_bsam gtan bzhi
[\[60b.2\]]pa yin no/_/de ni sa kun gyis mthun pas[#]/_/'phel ba'i rab tu phyin pa yin/_/ji ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin zhe na/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems las bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug la/_de las ni bsam gtan gnyis pa ste/_de bzhin du rim gyis
[\[60b.3\]]'du shes med [#]'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug go/_/mi mthun pa ni yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems kyi bar la'o/_/de las yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du mthun [#]pa yin te/_de ltar na sa thams cad kyis mthun par byas pa yin no/_/ji ltar na
